title: Boxing Errors
description: In this lab, the code demonstrates how to use the `Box` type to preserve original errors by wrapping them, allowing for dynamic error handling, and the `Std` library's `From` trait helps in converting any type that implements the `Error` trait into the trait object `Box<Error>`.

verify.name: Test the completion of step 1
